title: Lost in Harmony v1.1.3 full mod
description:
Dive into a fantastic musical odyssey, brought by an immersive soundtrack imagined by famous composers, including Wyclef Jean.
Go beyond by CREATING and SHARING your own levels on ANY SONG with the included level editor.

â–  DISCOVER the musical story from the co-creator of Valiant Hearts
â–  Guide Kaito and Aya through their adventures, in total harmony with music
â–  Travel trough 30+ painted environments
â–  Experience music in a new way with the combination of rhythmic tapping and choreographic runner
â–  Customize your character's clothes, headphones, hat and skateboard

Beyond the story, you can create and share your own Playtracks on ANY SONG! From pop music to electro, metal, rock, r&b and many more, enjoy infinite possibilities.

â–  Choose any track from your device, or stream it from SoundCloud
â–  CREATE your own Playtracks using the included level editor 
â–  Share your Playtracks and compete with your friends for the best score
â–  Join the worldwide Community and play an infinite choice of tracks from music lovers
â–  Select your landscape among beautiful artworks
â–  Play with your favorite character
â–  Easily record and publish your gaming session with Everyplay

5 levels are playable for free. To access the full story and the social part of the game, you need to buy the Gold version.

Languages: English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Italian, Dutch, Turkish, Russian, Chinese (simple), Chinese (traditional), Korean, Japanese, Indonesian, Thai, Vietnamese, Arabic

Genre: runner and rhythm game

Permissions needed :
â€¢ GET_ACCOUNTS (Shown as Contacts on Android 6.0) : Required for push notifications and Google Play Games
â€¢ Storage : Required for sharing your score screen
â€¢ Google Drive access : Required for automatic cloud save with Google Play Games
â€¢ READ_PHONE_STATE : Required to authenticate purchases

Whatâ€™s new:
NEW!
- New free level (Dream 0)
- Play with Aya and customize her!
- Create a link to your Playtrack and share it with your friends!
- New achievements
- You can now skip cutscenes
FIX:
- Fix issues when playing a Playtrack with a shorter music
- Display Playtrack creator name correctly on the score screen
- And various bug fixes, tweaks and improvements
The Digixart Team

What's in the mod:
Unlocked, full version

Install APK,Place data folder in SDCard/Android/Obb/ and play
Requires Android OS 4.1 and up
